title: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
description: An open-world action-adventure game where you explore the vast kingdom of Hyrule and uncover its secrets.

title: Elden Ring
description: A dark fantasy RPG developed by FromSoftware, featuring challenging combat and an expansive open world.

title: Minecraft
description: A sandbox game that allows players to build, explore, and create in a blocky 3D world.

title: Fortnite
description: A battle royale game where players fight to be the last one standing on a constantly shrinking map.

title: God of War Ragnar√∂k
description: The continuation of Kratos and Atreus' journey in a Norse mythological setting, with action-packed gameplay and a compelling story.

title: Grand Theft Auto V
description: An open-world action-adventure game that lets you explore Los Santos through the perspectives of three protagonists.

title: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare II
description: A first-person shooter game featuring tactical combat, a gripping campaign, and competitive multiplayer modes.

title: Red Dead Redemption 2
description: An immersive open-world western that follows the story of Arthur Morgan, a member of the Van der Linde gang.

title: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
description: A role-playing game where you take on the role of Geralt of Rivia, a monster hunter searching for his adopted daughter.

title: Super Mario Odyssey
description: A 3D platformer where Mario explores various kingdoms to save Princess Peach and stop Bowser's wedding plans.
